廉.definition: incorruptible; honest; inexpensive; to investigate (old); side wall of a traditional Chinese house (old)

廉俸.definition: extra allowances paid to government officials in the Qing dynasty

廉恥.definition: honor and shame; sense of honor

廉政.definition: to govern with integrity; clean and honest government

廉政公署.definition: Independent Commission Against Corruption, Hong Kong (ICAC)

廉江市.definition: Lianjiang, county-level city in Zhanjiang 湛江市[Zhan4jiang1 Shi4], Guangdong

廉直.definition: upright and honest; incorruptible; squeaky clean

廉署.definition: ICAC Independent Commission Against Corruption, Hong Kong

廉頗.definition: Lian Po (327-243 BC), famous general of Zhao 趙國|赵国, repeatedly victorious over Qin 秦國|秦国 and Qi 齊國|齐国
